Using APL patients and healthy people as the study subjects, SPME-GC/MS technology was used to detect the VOC in the exhaled gas of the subjects; the VOC components in the APL initial diagnosis group, the relapse group, the response group, and the healthy group were compared, and the characteristic VOC differences of the APL different disease state groups were analyzed using the Kruskal-Wallis variance, and the Dunn-Bonferroni test was used to compare the two.
